title: Merck Covid Pill Looks to Ease Hospital Strains
itunes:title: Merck Covid Pill Looks to Ease Hospital Strains
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone, discusses Merck's Covid drug reportedly reducing hospitalization and deaths. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Atlanta Bureau Chief Brett Pulley share Brett's Businessweek Magazine story Atlanta’s Wealthiest and Whitest District Wants to Secede. Bloomberg News Digital News Executive Editor Joe Weisenthal explains how the trillion-dollar coin avoids a constitutional crisis. Juthica Chou, Head of OTC Options Trading at Kraken, talks about Bitcoin volatility. And we Drive to the Close with Anu Gaggar, Global Investment Strategist at Commonwealth Financial Network.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
